messages.subject: Unschooling Circuit Rider Yahoo Group - Revised
messages.msgSnippet: There have been some helpful clarifications and revisions made to the original description of the unschooling circuit rider yahoo group.  Just wanted to keep
messages.messageBody:
There have been some helpful clarifications and revisions made to the original description
of the unschooling circuit rider yahoo group. Just wanted to keep everyone posted.
Joanne O'N.

Have you attended a unschooling conference wishing you could go to more during the
year? Have you never had a chance to attend a conference and have heard everyone
sharing how much they loved the one that just past? Do you belong to unschooling yahoo
groups but don't have time to get on and read as much as you would like since you are
busy doing other things with your family? Would you like to know about other types of
conferences where there will be at least one speaker who will be talking about
unschooling?

Here is one place where all statewide and larger unschooling conferences, gatherings,
speakers and events can be posted so that those of us who would like to "ride the circuit"
can easily find which ones are coming up. This includes anything from statewide to
international.

This particular yahoo group is not covering local unschooling groups. For local get-
togethers find a list for your local area.

If you know of an unschooling conference, gathering, speaker or event that is not posted
here, please add it to our list! If you know of a different type of conference, gathering,
speaker or event not specifically related to unschooling but which you think other life
learners might also be interested in, please e-mail me so we can consider posting it here
as well. :)

Looking forward to meeting you on the journey,
Joanne O'N.
dh: Charlie
